 maximum number of clients allowed to connect to the server.
unsigned int fuid
int killqueue [256]
 killqueue is a queue of clients to be killed. killqueue is a queue of clients to be removed from the server. it is an array of integers, where each integer is a position in the client list.
int freekillqueue
 freekillqueue holds the number of spots available in the killqueue
int servermode

int Sequencer::killqueue[256] [private]

killqueue is a queue of clients to be killed. killqueue is a queue of clients to be removed from the server. it is an array of integers, where each integer is a position in the client list.
